text: Arnold Thackray (born 30 July 1939) is an English science historian. He is the founding president of the Chemical Heritage Foundation (now the Science History Institute), the Life Sciences Foundation, and Science History Consultants. He is an emeritus professor at the University of Pennsylvania."Life Sciences Foundation--Telling the Story of Biotechnology" (https://www.biotech-now.org/business-and-investments/2012/04/the-life- sciences-foundation-%E2%80%93-telling-the-story-of-biotechnology ) ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:English historians Category:English scientists
title: Arnold Thackray
